title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When using Ctrl+M (Add Import) after selecting some text, nothing happens due to trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: Ctrl+M (Add Import) should successfully add the import statement, regardless of any leading or trailing whitespace within the selected text.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select some text with leading or trailing whitespace. 2. Use the shortcut Ctrl+M (Add Import).
